message: This time, the door opens.
I hesitate for a moment before entering.
The room is dark except for the blinking lights of machines. It's eerie, like a bunch of eyes staring at me.
Large tanks of fluid line both sides of the room, their contents unidentifiable.
I see what looks like patchworks of different animals, big masses of hair, all sorts of horrible stuff―glistening, twitching.
I even see what looks like human body parts attached to other objects―for what purpose, I can't imagine.
What the hell is all this?
Once I'm sure that no one is inside, I cautiously enter the room.
They must be doing some kind of research here... but what?
What purpose could these monsters serve? And where did the human parts here come from?
This is a fucking nightmare...
My eyes are drawn to a woman with the tail of a fish where her legs should be. A mermaid.
She's looking at me.
The mermaid with milky white eyes knocks on the glass with her hands.
Her mouth flaps open and closed.

name: 蒼葉
message: "W-What the..."
Unless I've completely lost my mind... the other creatures are looking at me too.

name: セイ
message: "I've... been wait...ing... for... so long..."

name: セイ
message: "Come... to me..."

name: セイ
message: "Destroy... me..."

name: セイ
message: "With your po...wer..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Nnngh!"
In my haste to flee, I crash into something solid.
A man has appeared behind me.
No! More than one!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh! What are you―let me go!"
I try to escape, but they catch me and pin me to the floor.
Who the hell are these guys?!
I turn my head to get a look at their faces, and that's when I see the mark on their jackets.
That's...
Morphine!
